title: BRIEF-Albany International Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.12
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Albany International Corp:
* ALBANY INTERNATIONAL REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.12 * Q4 SALES ROSE 6.4 PERCENT TO $226.7 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.43 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* OLIVIER JARRAULT HAS BEEN NAMED PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER TO SUCCEED JOSEPH G. MORONE
* DISCRETE TAX ITEMS & EFFECT OF CHANGE IN ESTIMATED INCOME TAX RATE INCREASED INCOME TAX EXPENSE BY $6.8 MILLION IN Q4 2017
* ESTIMATE 2018 TAX RATE ON INCOME FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS TO BE IN RANGE OF 27% TO 31%
* AS FOR OUTLOOK FOR 2018, EXPECT 20% TO 30% GROWTH IN FULL-YEAR SALES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
